SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am43
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Points

Class forEachDiagonalPattern

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am43.Model.Points.forEachDiagonalPattern
All Implemented Interfaces:
PointsRule, Serializable
public class forEachDiagonalPattern extends Object implements PointsRule, Serializable
This class represents the rule present in some ObjectiveCards. This rule states that, if the Player has placed 3 CardSides of a specific Kingdom, in a diagonal way, he/she gets 2 points. The direction of the diagonal and the Kingdom are specified by the ObjectiveCard itself.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • forEachDiagonalPattern

      public forEachDiagonalPattern(int points, Kingdom kingdom, boolean isTopLeft)
      Constructor for the class
      Parameters:
      points - the points earned by the Player for each pattern present in his/her placements matrix
      kingdom - the Kingdom of the CardSides that can be part of the patter, specified by the ObjectiveCard.
      isTopLeft - whether the pattern is on the top left or not
